name: mcp-apple-notes
description: Semantic search and RAG over Apple Notes using local embeddings
long_description: A Model Context Protocol server that enables semantic search over your Apple Notes using on-device embeddings. Search, retrieve, and create notes directly from Claude conversations. Features include vector search with LanceDB, full-text search, automatic indexing, and configurable chunking.

tools.name: get-note
tools.description: Get full content of a note by title

tools.name: search-notes
tools.description: Semantic search across all notes using vector embeddings

tools.name: index-notes
tools.description: Manually re-index all notes for semantic search

tools.name: create-note
tools.description: Create a new Apple Note with HTML content

tools.name: purge-index
tools.description: Clear the vector index to rebuild from scratch

tools.name: index-stats
tools.description: Get statistics about indexed notes and configuration
